sentences.en: Daily necessities, household appliances even money can also be won during mooncake festivities.
sentences.cn: 随着生活水平的提高,日用品 、 家电甚至现金都可以作为奖品.

sentences.en: HAN MEI: Would you like a mooncake?
sentences.cn: 韩梅: 想饮食吃月饼 吗 ?

sentences.en: I made pineapple snowy mooncake as I think already eaten very much lotus seed paste.
sentences.cn: 预料大家吃莲蓉太多,所以造了凤梨味的冰皮月饼.

sentences.en: Knock the mould against the table to dislodge the mooncake.
sentences.cn: 把模子往桌上敲,来移动月饼.

sentences.en: Parents make mooncakes, moon masks, and lanterns with their children.
sentences.cn: 家长们与他们的孩子们一起制作月饼、月亮形面具和灯笼。

sentences.en: Press dough ball into the mooncake mould.
sentences.cn: 将面团球放进月饼模子.

sentences.en: She likes to eat the mooncake with nut in it.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢吃那种带坚果果仁的月饼.

sentences.en: Tastefully prepared and beautifully packaged Hua Yue Mooncake Set is your perfect gift of the season!
sentences.cn: 纯正的月饼口感及高雅的礼盒设计,是您馈赠亲朋好友的最佳之选!

trans.tran_en: A mooncake is a type of cake that is eaten during the Chinese . It is filled with a thick paste, and often has a salted egg inside it.
